p.k: Stuck inside because of bad weather the Titans play rainy day games after Robin convinces them that indoor activites will cheer up the clouds and make the rain stop. / Robin refuses to give the Titans any more orders so that they'll learn to think for themselves. Instead the Titans start taking their cues from fortune cookies. / Robin convinces the Titans to go back to school with him so he can finally become the all-American class president-type he's dreamt of being. / Control Freak informs the Titans that they are on a TV show he created and demands they earn him an award. / Cyborg's real strength comes not from his robot parts, but from his favourite song.
